subject: Steroids
Perjury
Witnesses
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A federal prosecutor opened the case against Barry Bonds by calling his assertion that he did not know he was taking performance-enhancing drugs “an utterly ridiculous and unbelievable story.”
snippet: A federal prosecutor opened the case against Barry Bonds by calling his assertion that he did not know he was taking performance-enhancing drugs “an utterly ridiculous and unbelievable story.”
